channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @AvBronstein Luckily, he was defeated by someone with real Nazi allies.
@rmneiss I think that the America that emerges from the Gilead interregnum will be much less tolerant of “religious liberty.” https://t.co/DRQehvXU0R
Maybe we should be skeptical of all people of faith who proclaim themselves as answering to a higher, invisible, and abusive authority? https://t.co/THRNOAoQU9
@DemocraticLuntz @EladNehorai No, but the idea is the same. And Agudah has the federal office that Satmar lacks.
@EladNehorai Lots of ways this can go, including the possibility which would most please Agudah of us being moved into Agudah administered theocracies such as Lakewood and Kiryas Joel.
This is actually an optimistic take. I would argue that it’s actually the only mitzvah. https://t.co/PgE9u9vjsL

@pashulman @USNatArchives @eddyportnoy, you’re probably more qualified for this post than I am. Pay is certainly good, at least compared to Jewish journalism. Appropriately enough, a drug test is required.
@onthemainline The only appropriate reply would be to pierce one’s belly button and affix a mezuzah to the piercing, thus creating a Torah b’rshus ha-navel.
Actual words from a Shmuly Boteach column: "insisting on using my brain has held me back professionally and politically."
@DBashIdeas Same, but for the the Yetushalmi (vs its Babylonian sequel.)
@AryehCW I would argue that Mandel would have been worse, at least for the Jewish people. Better when the antisemite Christofascists aren’t mishpoche.

Speaking of local police departments: I really don’t understand how anyone can support banning off duty cops from smoking legal weed while allowing them to drink off duty, unless one actively wishes to maintain the problematic police culture. https://t.co/AgHgVYN0oQ
@Shmarya Fighting shoulder to shoulder with neonazis? Sounds like the Republican Jewish Coalition.
@LRB @bogiperson: For your octopus file.
@N_S_Dolkart I’ve repeatedly been told that’s its purpose. Would be tragic if the rogue SCOTUS majority was hoist by its own Heller.
@N_S_Dolkart If only we had an Amendment granting us the ability to fight back against unelected tyrants….
Looks like the new @storybundle collection features an anthology of trans SF edited by @benyehudapress social media maven @bogiperson. https://t.co/168hTPpyC7
I hope my friends have found new ways to watch Israeli television: Every ISP in the US has been ordered to block three Israeli pirate streaming services | Ars Technica https://t.co/hchkJfb5iO
@mikeblu201 Same reason they believe cops and corporate overlords are the good guys.
@AvBronstein Time drags so much slower once tachanun returns.
As I’ve told my kids, your source code may be open sourced some day, so code like you are dancing alone, but comment like the whole world is watching. https://t.co/zjxlyGiuSm https://t.co/uIHwuYNSt3
@jh_swanson @Shmarya As they, quite falsely, claim God had in mind when He founded this country.
